description: a(n) = smallest positive integer k such that 1+n*k! is a prime.
example: n=7, 1+7.k!={8,15,43,169,...}. The smallest k which gives prime is 3 and the prime so obtained is 43.n=267, the smallest k! is 31! for which 1+267*k! is prime and the prime so obtained is 65782709233423382541804503040000001.
prog: (PARI) a(n) = k = 1; while (!isprime(1+n*k!), k++); k; \\ _Michel Marcus_, Feb 20 2016
